_header: All that has liking for to hear
_description: Life of St Anne — 3456 lines in 12-line stanzas

MinULZ822.First Lines:
All þat haues lykyng for to lereOff prophetes sawes &
                    storys sereHerkens now to me…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…God graunt vs heuen at oure endyngSays all Amen be
                    dene
MinULZ822.Note:
Written with rhyming third, sixth, ninth, and twelfth lines written to
                    right of couplets they follow.
MinULZ822.Editions:
Parker,  Roscoe E.,
                        ed.  
             The Middle English Stanzaic Versions of the Life of St. Anne.
EETS
         o.s. 174 (1928); repr. 1987: 1-89.
